column2: February 12]], [[1971]]) is an American voice actor, probably best known as Robin in the TV series ''[[wikipedia:Teen Titans (TV series)
column3: Teen Titans]]''. He voiced [[Samwise Gamgee]] in the [[Vivendi]]'s video game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column4: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
